entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Oak Point
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:44 PM CST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -22.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Oak Point Marine 10:00 PM CST Thursday 23 February 2023
Temperature: -22.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 104.0 kPa rising
Humidity: 75 %
Wind Chill: -30
Dewpoint: -25.6°C
Wind: NW 10 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Clearing. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing near midnight. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 28 this evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 16.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 38 in the morning and minus 22 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 25. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 24 in the evening and minus 35 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 23 February 2023
